action.action-desc: Mr. Pitts (for himself, Mr. Pallone, Mr. Burgess, and Mrs. Capps) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To amend the Public Health Service Act to reauthorize support for graduate medical education programs in children’s hospitals.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Children’s Hospital GME Support Reauthorization Act of 2011.

section.header: Program of payments to children’s hospitals that operate graduate medical education programs

subsection.text: Section 340E of the Public Health Service Act (42 U.S.C. 256e) is amended—

paragraph.text: in subsection (f)(1)(A)(iv), by striking 2011 and inserting 2016; and
in subsection (f)(2)(D), by striking 2011 and inserting 2016.

subsection.text: Section 340E(b)(3)(D) of the Public Health Service Act (42 U.S.C. 256e(b)(3)(D)) is amended by striking Not later than the end of fiscal year 2011 and inserting Not later than the end of fiscal year 2015.
